name: bianassc
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3

stmt.origin: bitri(wa(w0, w1), wa(wa(w2, w0), w3), wa(wa(w0, w2), w3))

body.origin:
|- wb(wa(w0, w1), wa(wa(w2, w0), w3))
-| wb(wa(w0, w1), wa(wa(w0, w2), w3))
-| wb(wa(wa(w0, w2), w3), wa(wa(w2, w0), w3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wa(w0, w1), wa(wa(w2, w0), w3))
-| wb(wa(w0, w1), wa(wa(w0, w2), w3))
-| wb(wa(wa(w0, w2), w3), wa(wa(w2, w0), w3))

body.origin:
|- wb(wa(w0, w1), wa(wa(w0, w2), w3))
-| wb(w1, wa(w2, w3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wa(w0, w1), wa(wa(w2, w0), w3))
-| wb(wa(wa(w0, w2), w3), wa(wa(w2, w0), w3))
-| wb(w1, wa(w2, w3))

body.origin:
|- wb(wa(wa(w0, w2), w3), wa(wa(w2, w0), w3))
-| wb(wa(w0, w2), wa(w2, w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wa(w0, w1), wa(wa(w2, w0), w3))
-| wb(w1, wa(w2, w3))
-| wb(wa(w0, w2), wa(w2, w0))

|- wb(wa(w0, w1), wa(wa(w2, w0), w3))
-| wb(w1, wa(w2, w3))

comment: An inference to merge two lists of conjuncts. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 24-Sep-2022.)
